bibl.title: Early Christian Books in Egypt.
bibl.note: English version of: Livres chrétiens antiques d'Égypte = École pratique des hautes Études. IVe Section, Sciences historiques et philologiques. III. Hautes Études du monde gréco-romain. 44 (Genève, 2009). - Four lectures delivered at the École pratique des hautes Études in May 2006. - Preface. - I. The dating of the earliest Christian books in Egypt. General considerations. - II. Two case studies. - III. The economics of book production. - IV. The spread of the codex. - Notes. Bibliography. Index of subjects. Index of Papyrological lexts discussed.
